properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from High Island to Freeport TX out 20 NM; Coastal waters from Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel TX out 20 NM; Waters from Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel TX from 20 to 60 NM; Waters from High Island to Freeport TX from 20 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued February 19 at 3:44PM CST until February 21 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Houston/Galveston TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, north winds 20 to 25 kt
with gusts up to 30 kt and seas 4 to 7 feet expected. For the
Gale Watch, northeast winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 35 kt
and seas 7 to 10 feet possible.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel
TX out 20 NM, Coastal waters from High Island to Freeport TX
out 20 NM, Waters from Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel TX
from 20 to 60 NM and Waters from High Island to Freeport TX
from 20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, from 9 AM to 3 PM CST
Thursday. For the Gale Watch, from Thursday afternoon through
late Thursday night.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 3 PM CST THURSDAY... ...GALE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT
